page.title: 05Religion
page.content: Within our area of study there are several religious denominations.We went out into the area,did a count of the various places of worship.We found that in the largest settlement, {Evenwood},there were{4 places}of worship.One was the local{Church of {England}called{St.Pauls}.There was also a{Pentecostal}Church in the village plus a{Methodist Chapel}and also a{United Reformed}Church.In {Ramshaw}we found a Methodist Chapel and in{High Lands}a{Weslyan}Chapel. There was an old church in{Morley}but it was no longer in use as a church and has not been so for many many years.It appeared very derelict and seemed to be used as a cow byre nowadays.The thng we did notice was that within our whole area there was no place of worship for{Roman {Catholics}.
